availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard P. Hyrne (Carter County, Kentucky, tailor.)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, tailor. South Carolina native. Father of Alonzo Hyrne and Robert F. Hyrne. Married to Harriett Enix Hyrne. Father of George L. Hyrne, John C. F. Hyrne, Mark Hyrne, and Clarence Hyrne. Tailor in Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Tailor in Carter County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County, District 1, p. 218A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 262.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 1, p. 87B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994030, Carter County Births.
